name: មូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ (Databases)

meta.title: ការរួមបញ្ចូលមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL និង Firebase ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីមើលទិន្នន័យ រត់សំណើ និងសង់ឧបករណ៍ខាងក្នុង។

integrations.name: MySQL
integrations.tagline: គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យ MySQL របស់អ្នក និងសង់សំណើ SQL ក្នុង Jet Admin

meta.title: MySQL Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ MySQL ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីរកមើលតារាង រត់សំណើ និងសង់ឧបករណ៍ខាងក្នុងលើទិន្នន័យរបស់អ្នក។

integrations.content:
MySQL Integration

Connect your MySQL database to Jet Admin to explore tables, build queries visually, and power internal apps without boilerplate.

Key features
  • Secure read/write access with granular permissions
  • Visual query builder and SQL editor
  • Pagination, filters, and parameterized queries
  • Create, update, and delete records safely
  • Audit logs and environment-based connections
Getting started
  1. Go to Integrations → Databases → MySQL.
  2. Enter host, port, database, user, and password (or paste a connection URI).
  3. Whitelist Jet Admin IPs if required by your firewall.
  4. Test the connection and click Connect.
Use cases
  • Support dashboards (search users, refund orders)
  • Ops tooling (inventory updates, approvals)
  • Finance reporting (exports, reconciliation)
Requirements
  • MySQL 5.7+ or MariaDB-compatible
  • Network access from Jet Admin to your DB

Open the MySQL setup guide →
features: Connection pooling with query timeout controls
Explain plans and slow query insights
Bulk CSV/JSON import & export with schema mapping
Row-level guards and approval flows for writes
Secrets via environment variables or vault

integrations.name: MariaDB
integrations.tagline: គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យ MariaDB របស់អ្នក និងសង់សំណើ SQL ក្នុង Jet Admin

meta.title: MariaDB Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ MariaDB ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីសួរទិន្នន័យ គ្រប់គ្រងកំណត់ត្រា និងសង់ឧបករណ៍ខាងក្នុងបានរហ័ស។

integrations.content:
MariaDB Integration

Link your MariaDB instance to Jet Admin for fast querying, role-based access, and CRUD operations in minutes.

Key features
  • Visual data explorer with filters and search
  • SQL editor with parameters and templates
  • Safe mutations with confirmations and validations
  • Environment-specific credentials
Getting started
  1. Navigate to Integrations → Databases → MariaDB.
  2. Provide host, port, DB name, and credentials or a URI.
  3. Allow incoming traffic from Jet Admin IPs if needed.
  4. Test and connect.
Use cases
  • Customer success consoles
  • Content and catalog management
  • Operational analytics

Open the MariaDB setup guide →
features: Audit diff viewer for changed rows

integrations.name: PostgreSQL
integrations.tagline: គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យ PostgreSQL និងសង់សំណើ SQL ក្នុង Jet Admin

meta.title: PostgreSQL Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Postgres ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីរកមើល schema រត់សំណើ និងសង់កម្មវិធីខាងក្នុងយ៉ាងមានសុវត្ថិភាព។

integrations.content:
PostgreSQL Integration

Securely connect PostgreSQL and unlock visual querying, actions, and app building over your existing schema.

Key features
  • Schema-aware explorer and ER insights
  • Parameterized queries and stored procedures
  • Row-level actions & bulk updates
  • RBAC and audit trails
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Databases → PostgreSQL.
  2. Enter connection details or paste a connection URI.
  3. Configure SSL if required.
  4. Test and connect.
Use cases
  • Admin panels for SaaS
  • Ops workflows (refunds, flags, approvals)
  • Data exports for BI

Open the PostgreSQL setup guide →
features: Support for views, materialized views, and functions

integrations.name: Firebase
integrations.tagline: គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យ Firebase ក្នុង Jet Admin

meta.title: Firebase Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Firebase ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីរកមើល Collection កែសម្រួលឯកសារ និងសង់ឧបករណ៍លើ Firestore/RTDB។

integrations.content:
Firebase Integration

Plug in Firebase (Firestore or Realtime Database) to manage documents, run queries, and power internal tools.

Key features
  • Collection/document browser with filters
  • JSON editor with validation
  • Role-based permissions for edits
  • Actions and automations on document changes
Getting started
  1. Go to Integrations → Databases → Firebase.
  2. Upload service account JSON or connect via OAuth.
  3. Select project and data store (Firestore/RTDB).
  4. Test and connect.

Open the Firebase setup guide →
features: Firestore queries with compound indexes and cursors
Batch writes and transactions with rollback
Security rules preview against sample payloads

name: ទ្វារទូទាត់ (Payment Gateway)

meta.title: ការរួមបញ្ចូលទ្វារទូទាត់ — Jet Admin
meta.description: ដំណើរការ Stripe, PayPal, Square និង Razorpay ក្នុង Jet Admin ដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រងអតិថិជន ការទូទាត់ សប្ដាហ៍ជាវ និងការសងប្រាក់វិញ។

integrations.name: Stripe
integrations.tagline: ទទួលការទូទាត់តាមអ៊ីនធឺណិត និងគ្រប់គ្រងសប្ដាហ៍ជាវដោយ Stripe។

meta.title: Stripe Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Stripe ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រងអតិថិជន ការទូទាត់ សប្ដាហ៍ជាវ និងការសងប្រាក់វិញ កន្លែងតែមួយ។

integrations.content:
Stripe Integration

Operate your billing stack—customers, invoices, subscriptions—directly in Jet Admin.

Key features
  • Search customers, payments, disputes
  • Create/refund charges and manage subscriptions
  • Issue credits and handle coupons
  • Export payouts and reconciliation data
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Payments → Stripe.
  2. Connect your Stripe account via OAuth.
  3. Select live or test mode.
  4. Grant required scopes and finish.

Open the Stripe setup guide →
features: Subscription schedule edits with proration preview
Invoice creation, void, and PDF download
Dispute evidence upload and status tracking
Webhooks viewer for recent event payloads
Test/live mode switch with safe guards

integrations.name: PayPal
integrations.tagline: ធ្វើប្រតិបត្តិការដោយសុវត្ថិភាពជាសកលដោយប្រើ PayPal។

meta.title: PayPal Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ PayPal ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីតាមដានប្រតិបត្តិការ សងប្រាក់វិញ និងគ្រប់គ្រងអតិថិជនជាសកល។

integrations.content:
PayPal Integration

Centralize PayPal payments and customer operations in Jet Admin.

Key features
  • Transaction search and filters
  • Refund and dispute workflows
  • Customer and subscription insights
Getting started
  1. Go to Integrations → Payments → PayPal.
  2. Authenticate with your PayPal Business account.
  3. Select environment (sandbox/live) and finish.

Open the PayPal setup guide →
features: Partial and full refunds with notes
Subscription plan changes and trial handling
Sandbox/live toggle with test data helpers

integrations.name: Phillip Bank
integrations.tagline: ប្រមូល និងបង់ប្រាក់តាម API អាជីវកម្មរបស់ Phillip Bank។

meta.title: Phillip Bank Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Phillip Bank ដើម្បីទទួលផ្ទេរ ត្រួតពិនិត្យប្រតិបត្តិការ និងគ្រប់គ្រងអ្នកទទួលប្រាក់ក្នុង Jet Admin។

integrations.content:
Phillip Bank Integration

Operate Phillip Bank collections and payouts right from Jet Admin.

Key features
  • Account & transaction lookup
  • Incoming payments and auto-reconciliation
  • Bulk disbursements (salary, payouts)
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Payments → Phillip Bank.
  2. Enter API credentials and callback URLs.
  3. Test webhooks and connect.

Open the Phillip Bank setup guide →
features: KHQR payment request links (via bank support)

integrations.name: ABA Bank
integrations.tagline: ទទួលផ្ទេរ និងគ្រប់គ្រងការបង់ប្រាក់ជាកញ្ចប់ជាមួយ ABA Bank។

meta.title: ABA Bank Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ ABA Bank ដើម្បីទទួលប្រាក់ បើកការបង់ប្រាក់ និងធ្វើប្រកាន់គណនីក្នុង Jet Admin។

integrations.content:
ABA Bank Integration

Plug ABA into your back office for smooth collections and disbursements.

Key features
  • Account balance & statements
  • Incoming transfers & KHQR support
  • Bulk payouts with status tracking
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Payments → ABA Bank.
  2. Provide API key/secret and whitelisted IPs.
  3. Configure webhooks and connect.

Open the ABA setup guide →

integrations.name: ACLEDA Bank
integrations.tagline: ប្រមូល និងបង់ប្រាក់តាមបណ្តាញធនាគារទូទាំងប្រទេសជាមួយ ACLEDA Bank។

meta.title: ACLEDA Bank Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ ACLEDA ដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រង KHQR ផ្ទេរ និងរបាយការណ៍សងសងក្នុង Jet Admin។

integrations.content:
ACLEDA Bank Integration

Use ACLEDA’s reach to collect nationwide and automate reconciliations.

Key features
  • KHQR generation & validation
  • Incoming transfer monitoring
  • Mass payouts & salary files
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Payments → ACLEDA.
  2. Enter API credentials and register webhook endpoints.
  3. Run a test transaction and connect.

Open the ACLEDA setup guide →

integrations.name: Canadia Bank
integrations.tagline: ប្រមូល និងសងប្រាក់តាម Canadia Bank។

meta.title: Canadia Bank Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Canadia Bank ដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទេរ KHQR និងការនាំចេញរបាយការណ៍សងសងក្នុង Jet Admin។

integrations.content:
Canadia Bank Integration

Centralize Canadia transactions with reconciliation automations.

Key features
  • KHQR payment requests
  • Incoming/outgoing transfers
  • Settlement exports
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Payments → Canadia Bank.
  2. Provide client credentials and webhook URL.
  3. Test connectivity and go live.

Open the Canadia setup guide →

integrations.name: Wing Bank
integrations.tagline: ការទូទាត់ គណនី និង Cash-in/Cash-out ដោយគ្មានសាច់ប្រាក់តាម Wing Bank។

meta.title: Wing Bank Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Wing Bank ដើម្បីទទួល KHQR គ្រប់គ្រងសេចក្តីយោងភ្នាក់ងារ cash-in/out និងអូតូម៉ាតការបង់ប្រាក់។

integrations.content:
Wing Bank Integration

Leverage Wing’s network for payments and disbursements.

Key features
  • KHQR & wallet payments
  • Agent cash-in/cash-out references
  • Bulk disbursements
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Payments → Wing Bank.
  2. Enter API credentials and webhook endpoints.
  3. Enable products (QR, wallet, payouts) and connect.

Open the Wing setup guide →

integrations.name: Bakong
integrations.tagline: KHQR និងផ្ទេរប្រាក់ភ្លាមៗតាមប្រព័ន្ធ Bakong នៃកម្ពុជា។

meta.title: Bakong Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ទៅបណ្តាញ Bakong ដើម្បីបង្កើត KHQR ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ការទូទាត់ និងធ្វើប្រកាន់គណនីផ្ទេរភ្លាមៗក្នុង Jet Admin។

integrations.content:
Bakong Integration

Use Bakong (National Bank of Cambodia) rails for interoperable QR and instant payments.

Key features
  • KHQR create/verify
  • Instant transfer status
  • Reconciliation exports
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Payments → Bakong.
  2. Enter Bakong API credentials (via your sponsoring bank).
  3. Configure webhook endpoints and connect.

Open the Bakong setup guide →
features: P2M & P2P QR flows with metadata
Invoice ID embedding in QR payload

integrations.name: AMK Bank
integrations.tagline: ប្រមូលការទូទាត់ និងបង់ប្រាក់ជាកញ្ចប់ជាមួយ AMK Bank។

meta.title: AMK Bank Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ AMK Bank ដើម្បីទទួលប្រាក់ KHQR/ផ្ទេរ និងអូតូម៉ាតការបង់ប្រាក់កញ្ចប់ក្នុង Jet Admin។

integrations.content:
AMK Bank Integration

Bring AMK into your operations for collections and payouts.

Key features
  • Transfers & KHQR
  • Bulk payouts
  • Statement imports
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Payments → AMK Bank.
  2. Provide client ID/secret and allowed IPs.
  3. Set webhooks and test.

Open the AMK setup guide →

name: ការផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ភាសសញ្ញា (Authentication)

meta.title: ការរួមបញ្ចូល Authentication — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Auth0, Firebase Auth, Okta និង Keycloak ដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រងអ្នកប្រើ ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងសិទ្ធិក្នុង Jet Admin។

integrations.name: Auth0
integrations.tagline: Authentication មានសុវត្ថិភាពជាមួយ Auth0 រួមទាំង social logins។

meta.title: Auth0 Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Auth0 ដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រងអ្នកប្រើ ក្រុមហ៊ុន និង social logins ពី Jet Admin។

integrations.content:
Auth0 Integration

Bring Auth0 into Jet Admin to inspect users, reset passwords, and manage roles.

Key features
  • User search and profile editing
  • Password reset and email verification
  • Role and permission updates
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Authentication → Auth0.
  2. Create a Machine-to-Machine app and copy Domain, Client ID, and Secret.
  3. Grant Management API scopes and connect.

Open the Auth0 setup guide →
features: Blocked login and MFA reset actions

integrations.name: Firebase Auth
integrations.tagline: បើកចូលតាម Google, Facebook, GitHub និង Email/Password ជាមួយ Firebase។

meta.title: Firebase Auth Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Firebase Auth ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីមើលអ្នកប្រើ បណ្ដាញផ្តល់សេវា និងគ្រប់គ្រងសិទ្ធិយ៉ាងមានសុវត្ថិភាព។

integrations.content:
Firebase Auth Integration

Manage Firebase users and providers from a single console.

Key features
  • User directory and filters
  • Provider linking/unlinking
  • Reset passwords and disable accounts
Getting started
  1. Go to Integrations → Authentication → Firebase Auth.
  2. Upload service account or connect your Firebase project.
  3. Test and connect.

Open the Firebase Auth setup guide →
features: Custom claims editor for role flags
Usage metrics: sign-in methods and errors

integrations.name: Okta
integrations.tagline: អត្តសញ្ញាណ និងការគ្រប់គ្រងការចូលប្រើកម្រិតសហគ្រាសជាមួយ Okta។

meta.title: Okta Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Okta ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រងអ្នកប្រើ ក្រុម និងការចែកចាយកម្មវិធី។

integrations.content:
Okta Integration

Operate your Okta directory directly from Jet Admin for streamlined support and IT workflows.

Key features
  • User and group management
  • App assignments and deprovisioning
  • Role-based access controls
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Authentication → Okta.
  2. Create an API token and provide your Okta domain.
  3. Test permissions and connect.

Open the Okta setup guide →
features: App assignment by group with filters
Bulk user updates with safety checks

integrations.name: Keycloak
integrations.tagline: អត្តសញ្ញាណ និងការគ្រប់គ្រងសិទ្ធិប្រភពបើកចំហជាមួយ Keycloak។

meta.title: Keycloak Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Keycloak ទៅ Jet Admin ដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រង realms អ្នកប្រើ និង roles សម្រាប់កម្មវិធីរបស់អ្នក។

integrations.content:
Keycloak Integration

Use Jet Admin as a control panel over your Keycloak users and roles.

Key features
  • User search, create, disable
  • Role mappings and group assignments
  • Password resets and email verification
Getting started
  1. Go to Integrations → Authentication → Keycloak.
  2. Create a client with admin scopes and obtain credentials.
  3. Enter server URL, realm, client ID/secret and connect.

Open the Keycloak setup guide →

name: សារ & ការជូនដំណឹង (Messaging & Notifications)

meta.title: ការរួមបញ្ចូលសារ និងការជូនដំណឹង — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Twilio, SendGrid, FCM និង Amazon SNS ដើម្បីផ្ញើ SMS អ៊ីមែល និង push notifications ពី Jet Admin។

integrations.name: Twilio
integrations.tagline: ផ្ញើសារ SMS, WhatsApp និងសំលេងជាមួយ Twilio។

meta.title: Twilio Integration — Jet Admin
meta.description: ភ្ជាប់ Twilio ដើម្បីផ្ញើ SMS/WhatsApp កំណត់ហៅ និងតាមដានការដឹកជញ្ជូនពី Jet Admin។

integrations.content:
Twilio Integration

Trigger and monitor Twilio messages from Jet Admin with guardrails and audit logs.

Key features
  • Send SMS/WhatsApp messages
  • Templated outreach with variables
  • Status tracking and error handling
Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Messaging → Twilio.
  2. Provide Account SID and Auth Token.
  3. Verify sender IDs and connect.

Open the Twilio setup guide →
features: Attachment support and media storage hooks
Inbound webhook handling to update tickets
Voice call initiation with call status

integrations.tagline: ផ្ញើអ៊ីមែលប្រតិបត្តិ និងទីផ្សារតាមរយៈ SendGrid។

meta.title: SendGrid Integration — Jet Admin

integrations.content:

Build reliable email workflows with SendGrid, right from Jet Admin.

Key features
  • Send templated and ad-hoc emails
  • Variables and attachments
  • Delivery/open tracking
Getting started
  1. Go to Integrations → Messaging → SendGrid.
  2. Paste your API key with Mail Send permission.
  3. Test and connect.

Open the SendGrid setup guide →

features: Image, sound, and deep link helpers

integrations.name: Amazon SNS

meta.title: Amazon SNS Integration — Jet Admin

Delivery status logs and DLQ guidance
Publishing to FIFO topics with deduplication
SMS spend and origination number settings

integrations.name: AWS S3
integrations.tagline: ផ្ទុក និងទាញយកទិន្នន័យគ្រប់បរិមាណលើខ្នាតធំជាមួយ AWS S3។

integrations.content:

Key features
  • Browse buckets and prefixes

Getting started
  1. Open Integrations → Storage → AWS S3.
  2. Enter Access Key, Secret, and Region with S3 permissions.
  3. Test and connect.

Open the AWS S3 setup guide →

Lifecycle policies to Glacier/IA and expirations
Presigned URL generator with custom expiry
IAM role assumption (STS) for least privilege
